title: Till what time does placements go on?
content: I just finished my third year and they asked us to register for placements, my gpa is 7.9. I wasn't able to get it above 8, I'm not confident in my skills as well, so i wanted to know from the seniors till what time companies keep coming and do I have enough time to work hard and get placed before placement ends.

comments.body: Most companies would have visit by the end of 7th sem, or at most January in 8th sem. This is because spring internships start in January. The number of companies greatly reduces from Feb onward and the season ends around May/June.

There is no fixed order of companies that visit. It does not follow T1 and then T2 and then T3 and so on. The order is random and it changes every year so it is not really possible to predict. However, it *is* established that *most* T1 and T2 companies visit before January.
Thanks a lot for this information!
